imdb.plot outline: The scenic beauty of the Yamagata Prefecture in the Tohoku region of Japan make it a go-to destination for many seasoned world travelers. The fresh fruits that are grown year-round, the relaxing hot springs, and the rural charms of the region make it especially attractive to visitors, especially travelers from Taiwan. Hosts Hitoto Tae, a Taiwanese-Japanese actress, and Kumagai Hitomi, a Yamagata television announcer, take you on a tour of the sights and sounds of Yamagata and help uncover all the reasons that Taiwanese tourists love it there.
imdb.title: Yamagata: In Search of Another Japan
akas: Yamagata: In Search of Another Japan (Japan)
plot: The scenic beauty of the Yamagata Prefecture in the Tohoku region of Japan make it a go-to destination for many seasoned world travelers. The fresh fruits that are grown year-round, the relaxing hot springs, and the rural charms of the region make it especially attractive to visitors, especially travelers from Taiwan. Hosts Hitoto Tae, a Taiwanese-Japanese actress, and Kumagai Hitomi, a Yamagata television announcer, take you on a tour of the sights and sounds of Yamagata and help uncover all the reasons that Taiwanese tourists love it there.
